front.title: Proposal for Auto-Configuration in Virtual Aggregation

abstract.t: Virtual Aggregation as specified in [I-D.ietf-grow-va] requires a certain amount of configuration, namely virtual prefixes (VP), a VP list, type of tunnel, and popular prefixes. This draft proposes optional approaches to auto-configuration of popular prefixes and the VP list, and discusses the pros and cons of each. If these proposals are accepted, they will be incorporated into [I-D.ietf-grow-va].
